laboratory_examinations.findings: Lipase 175, Alk Phos 417, AST 362, ALT 159, Total bilirubin 6.8, Direct bilirubin 5.3, INR 1.1; findings indicate elevated levels outside normal range.

Significant hepatic steatosis and hepatomegaly. The gallbladder is elongated with mild pericholecystic fluid and edema within the gallbladder wall. A gallstone is present; no dilation of intra or extrahepatic biliary tree.
